description: In Windows Vista and Windows 7, S2QL files can be found in subdirectories of the [user]\​AppData\​Local\​Blizzard Entertainment\​Battle.net\​Cache\​ directory.
In Mac OS X, they can be found in the subdirectories of this directory: [user]/​Shared/​Blizzard/​Battle.net/​Cache/​
NOTE: Since S2QL files are saved in XML, you can view them with any text editor.
